title: New: Isabelle Young – Sirens
body:
“A year ago I was a little adrift, so I sat down to write some music.

This was the first song that poured out of me.”

‘Pour’ feels like a very suitable word, for this luxurious debut track from Montreal’s **Isabelle Young**, lifted from her debut EP expected in May. _Sirens_ begins rather sombre, and blossoms into a gorgeous, deeply emotive number, with Young’s Hannah Reid-esque vocals taking centre stage. Check it out below.
